message: As I flounder, I can feel several sets of footsteps vibrating through the floor.
A new group of men enters the room. They have a similar look as the two who left.

name: ミンク
message: "Do it."
The giant jerks his chin at me.
What? Are they gonna beat me?
I watch the men approach and steel myself for a beating. There's nothing else I can do.
The men form a loose circle around me.
I brace myself for the first hit.
One of them grabs my jacket.
Another pins my legs and arms...
...What are they doing?
I look at their faces. They seem... excited.
They're breathing hard, and their eyes are bloodshot.

name: 囚人Ａ
message: "Hold him down good."
My blood goes cold.
You have got to be kidding me!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let me go!"
I try to free my arms. The ropes are looser than before.

Just a little more...<K>
A little more...
I'm out!
But before I can do anything, someone grabs my arms and pins them to the floor.

name: 囚人Ｂ
message: "Hey, what're you doin'? I told you to hold him down."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let―Let go!"
I see the giant standing behind them, arms folded, watching me with cold, detached eyes.
That son of a bitch...

name: 囚人Ｃ
message: "Hehe, don't blame us for this."

name: 囚人Ａ
message: "We can't disobey Mink's orders."
Mink? Is that the giant's name?
The thought only occupies my attention for a moment. Then I tremble at the feeling of hot, sticky breath against my cheek.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I said let me go! You're fucking crazy!"

name: 囚人Ｂ
message: "Shut the fuck up!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh!"
One of them smacks me across the face. Pain and the taste of blood fill my mouth.

name: 囚人Ｃ
message: "Guys aren't really my thing, but I'll do 'em if I have to."
A meaty paw gropes at my chest.

name: 囚人Ａ
message: "But look how pale he is. And his hair's long, too. He totally looks like a chick if you squint, don't he?"

name: 囚人Ｃ
message: "I dunno, man. A dude's still a dude."
Exactly! I'm a man! Now let me go, assholes!
Feeling a surge of rage, I spit a wad of blood at the man next to me.

name: 囚人Ｂ
message: "Ngh! You little shit!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hands off!"

name: 囚人Ｂ
message: "Ugh!"
I kick him in the stomach while he's distracted, and he lurches forward in pain.
Serves you right.
He pays me back with a slug to the face, twice as hard.
Shit...

name: 囚人Ａ
message: "I've got him pinned. Hurry up and strip 'im!"

name: 囚人Ｃ
message: "Yeah, yeah."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ah! Stop! Don't touch me!"
He tears my belt off and starts unbuttoning my pants.
Another hand snakes in from the side and grabs my shirt, pulling it up over my chest so hard it almost rips.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let me go!"

name: 囚人Ｂ
message: "Shut up! Gag him."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mpffgh!"
They stuff a rag into my mouth. The way the cloth sticks to the insides of my cheeks makes me want to vomit.
I try to shout, but only groans emerge.

name: 囚人Ｃ
message: "Aw fuck, I think I could actually get into this. Look at this hardon, man!"

name: 囚人Ａ
message: "Just fuck him already so I can have a turn."

name: 囚人Ｂ
message: "I'm next!"
One of the men pulls off my pants and underwear.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mmmmmph!"
Though I flail my legs, I can't offer much meaningful resistance with my arms pinned. Soon, my lower body is fully exposed.

name: 囚人Ａ
message: "Man, seein' his junk is really harshing my boner."

name: 囚人Ｃ
message: "Not mine."

name: 囚人Ｂ
message: "No shit? Wait, you ever done it from behind before?"

name: 囚人Ｃ
message: "Some chicks like it from behind."
Rough hands slide up my thighs to my ass, and then fingers press between my cheeks.
A wave of disgust ripples through my body. I feel like I'm losing my mind.
I'm not scared, or even mad. It's just so... disgusting!

Why me?<k>
I just wanted to find Granny...
That giant...
This is all his fault!
He's still watching me.
He's going to watch them rape me. Does he think this is funny?
Why is he doing this?<k> What's the point?<k> Why me?
Why...
Why the hell is this happening?!

name: 囚人Ａ
message: "He got quiet all of a sudden."

name: 囚人Ｃ
message: "I guess he's given up."

name: 囚人Ｂ
message: "Then fuck him already."

name: 囚人Ａ
message: "Hey, is he okay?"

name: 囚人Ｃ
message: "Hey... Huh? What...?"

name: 囚人Ｂ
message: "Wh-What? What the..."

name: 囚人Ａ
message: "Ahhhh..."

name: 白蒼葉
message: "...Disappear."
